patternScaleSmall.Wiki: The UV scale to use with the pattern texture when applied to 'Small' parts.

patternScaleMedium.Wiki: The UV scale to use with the pattern texture when applied to 'Medium' parts.

patternScaleLarge.Wiki: The UV scale to use with the pattern texture when applied to 'Large' parts.

Self.Wiki:
Defines the Pattern options for Armored Cores.

Row ID links the Preset to the icon texture in SB_Camouflage.dds and SB_Camouflage.layout

Row ID + 210701 links the Preset to the FMG name it uses in the menu.
